celebrationSection1.title: Four Decades of Design
celebrationSection1.description: With 40 years of experience, we create living spaces that balance luxury with lasting quality. Our work is built to stand the test of time. This is design that doesn’t just fill a room, but defines it; serving as the quiet foundation for the life you build within.

celebrationSection2.title: Art of living
celebrationSection2.description: Through our bespoke mastery, every corner becomes a silent chapter of your unique story.

cherfanPlus.title: Light and Space
cherfanPlus.description: Beyond the blueprint lies a home with a soul. Journey through our curated world—from the heart of the kitchen to the finest living details; designed to elevate every moment.

kidsBedroomSection.label: KIDS BEDROOM
kidsBedroomSection.title: Where Dreams Take Flight
kidsBedroomSection.description: Every child deserves a space that sparks imagination and nurtures growth. Our kids bedroom designs blend playful creativity with thoughtful functionality, creating environments where young minds can explore, dream, and thrive. From whimsical themes to timeless elegance, we craft bedrooms that grow with your child while maintaining the warmth and comfort they need.

cards.label: The Craft
cards.description: Our team brings decades of technical knowledge to every piece we build. Skilled hands ensure that every detail meets our standards for durability and finish.

cards.label: The Production
